short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows HKU students to show your current courses (in a semester) in a separate entry in HKU Moodle. By: Andrew Z

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What's new: Now supports the updated Moodle page, ensuring smooth integration and functionality. 🚀

🌟 How to Add a Course to Your Semester List
STEP 1: Click on "Add to this semester" for any course.

STEP 2: Voilà! 🎉 The course will appear at the top of the page under "Course of this semester".


What's New in Moodle Helper? 🎓
Easier Course Management: You can now add any course directly to your "Course of this semester" list—whether you found it through search or from the homepage! 🔍

Seamless Syncing: Your semester list syncs across all Chrome browsers where you're logged into the same Google account. 🔗

Quick Cleanup: Simply click the grey "X" on the right side of "Course of this semester" and your semester list is cleared. 🧹

Flexible Removal: Change your mind? Just hit "Remove from this semester" anytime. Or, click the grey "X" on the top right corner of the course card in the "Course of this semester" column to remove courses. ❌


💡 Got Suggestions or Feedback?
We’d love to hear from you! Just click "Feedback" in the Moodle interface to share your thoughts. 🗣️

🙏 Special Thanks
A big shoutout to @Xiang-CH (GitHub) for contributions to version 1.4.8, which now supports the updated Moodle. 

This project is open-sourced on GitHub. 💻
